overview: In this revealing documentary, patron, collector, and curator Dominique de Menil hangs the 1973 exhibition "Inside the Sight," in conversation with Max Ernst, the 20th-century Surrealist artist. From installation to opening party, the events that transpire, as captured by filmmakers John and Francois de Menil, provide a rare and intimate glimpse into the process of making an exhibition.
title: Max Ernst Hanging
